price: Os que renegam a Fé terão veemente castigo. E os que crêem e fazem as boas obras terão perdão e grande prêmio.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ شَدِيدٞۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٞ وَأَجۡرٞ كَبِيرٌ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna kafarū lahum ʿadhābun shadīdun wa-alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti lahum maghfiratun wa-ajrun kabīrun
